entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
